thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination says actual controller proposes 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination says actual controller proposes 2017 dividend payment

organizations.name: beijing yuanlong yato culture dissemination co ltd

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination Co Ltd
* Says its actual controller proposed to pay a cash dividend of 4 yuan (pre-tax) for every 10 shares, and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares, as the dividend payment plan for 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/QLunbx
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
